website_summaries.verdict: Though they aren't ideal for strenuous activity, these classic sneakers are popular, affordable, and comfortable.
pros: A must-have pair for men who want inexpensive, good-looking sneakers that provide all-day comfort and stylish looks
Unique retro flair combined with contemporary lines and colors
cons: Shoes run on the narrow and tight side, and squeak during the break-in period
May wear out quicker if worn for running

customer_reviews.title: Not Original!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not Original!!!! There’s no way that after a few times I have used these snickers the color has fainted (see pics), these are relatively “new” and literally the gold color is gone on one side.... I wear shoes all the time due to my office job and these were one of my 6 pairs for the weekends and in Less than 2 months and just 3 or 4 times that I wore the tenis I get this drama, ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Rubén

customer_reviews.title: BIG FOOT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is for people with narrow feet my feet are wide that is why I will never again buy sneakers on line I will go to a sneaker store where I can try the sneakers on before I buy them this brand of sneakers is not for people with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: AlanWarner

customer_reviews.title: Fit is just a bit narrow and short
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size but this pair gives my foot a strange feel. The heel and foot section fits well but is a bit tight across the toes. This is unlike my other Pumas that I wear regularly of the same size. Also, there is no extra room in the length like my other sneakers or athletic shoes that I own of same size. I could easily have ordered a half-size larger. Other than the tighter fit, I have no other complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Narrow - Reminiscent of Fat Hot Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow to mid-width feet, but these were too narrow even for me. I have another pair of Puma shoes that are narrow and that I like, but these were so narrow that I could see the problem as soon as I had opened the box - even before putting the shoes on. They reminded me of fat hot dogs. Ordering a size larger makes no sense to me, since the length was fine; the width was the problem. To make matters worse, Amazon ships the shoe box in a glued-together plastic wrap that tears to pieces upon opening. Since the wrap could not be used for return shipping, I had to provide my own return box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic shoes for walking and with the specially designed tread will make a great shoe for this winter when the snow and ice begins covering the ground and making slipping a possibility. They are so well designed and tailored to fit that I can't imagine being without them. They are even nice enough to wear with a suit on Sundays. I previously had Hush Puppies and was looking to get them again but they were almost $100 more expensive. So glad I bought these because they appear (to me at least) to be better constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: 🤔
customer_reviews.text: I Just got the sneakers. Got ready to go to a party, looking good, sneakers looking fly & Im looking super Good. Well after a few hours, the rear heal glue came undone on the left sneaker, turning my sneaker into a flip flop & a clapping toung. Smh...Dont buy from here. 🤦‍♂️ This should of never happened to a new sneaker. unbelievable, what a bad night I had & I was so embarrassed as the two girls I was with, made fun of me all night with no victory in it for me. lol yea not really. Cant even return them because I had them on the street. Dont buy from this link.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Nice design & fit, but ultra-cheap construction & materials
customer_reviews.text: Typical Puma quality. Overpriced designer merch that looks nice but won't last long. Outer sole is OK but uppers are fake vinyl 'leather' that quickly cracks & splits with average use. Mid-sole & footbed are not stitched but basically just stiff cardboard that won't last long–especially if it gets wet. Insole is glued down & can't be replaced. The quality here is cheap as possible, what you would expect from knock-off discount outfits, Walmart, etc, but not from a major brand. However, designer labels like Puma, et al, are mainly just about fashion & marketing, NOT about quality. So these are par for the course for most designer merch.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fulery

customer_reviews.title: Knock Offs!!! Not real Pumas!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in an unofficial (not even Puma logo box). Shoes are not trade marked and don't appear to be real Pumas. I've seen these knockoffs being made on the streets of Port au Prince, Haiti. The tag on the inside tongue should have a little TM next to the shoe name. The material is not leather either.
customer_reviews.author: mr fix it

customer_reviews.title: Made for a Kangaroo foot
customer_reviews.text: Like everybody says - too narrow. I normally wear 11.5 M. Ordered 12 in these. By ordering 12 instead of 11.5 - they work, but still a little bit tight in width. Here's something obvious I just figured out today. WHEN YOU GET THEM, LOOSEN THE LACES ALL THE WAY DOWN TO THE BASE OF THE TONGUE! That helped the narrowness problem a bunch. Didn't completely solve it - but helped.
customer_reviews.author: Bike Obsessed

customer_reviews.title: These are the most narrow shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't know who can fit these shoes on their feet. Are there really people out there with feet this narrow? Right out of the box just looking at them I couldn't believe it but I thought I would give it a try. I fit in them but it was TIGHT. I thought maybe I just have to get used to them. I wore them to work and by lunch time my feet were KILLING ME. I had to go home and put on a normal pair of shoes. I have never had to do that, ever. These are ridiculously narrow. Returned instantly. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to normal size
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing size 9 sneakers my entire adult life with no issues. First time buying Puma - not even close. They sent the correct size - men's 9 US - I can't even get it past my toes. I physically cannot get this sneaker on my foot, with a thin sock, much less being comfortable. Have to send it back - on principle. I wouldn't buy a Puma unless you're in a store and can try it on cause their sizing is way way different than any other major brand sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: luvthewest

customer_reviews.title: Good made, and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black ones, not for training or sports but for every day at the office. Good made, and looks nice. I feel comfortable and they suite the purpose I bought them for. My size is between 9 and 10, I took 10 and it is just perfect for me. In the begining I thought it will be too narrow - but after few hours they expand to the width of my feet. I think it is a good buying. Concerning quality - I'll wait and see how will they last over time and will report and modify the 5 stars grade accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: KindCust

customer_reviews.title: More narrow than a pin head.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are VERY narrow. I had to get 2 sizes up, and even then they are TOO tight. They are comfy for a little while but eventually you feel like you're walking in baguettes? They grow tighter easily and rub against the tops of your foot. Just go 3 or 4 sizes up if you get them. I'm a 6/6.5(US Mens) and I got a 8.5 but I felt like I should have gone all the way up to a 10. I am honestly thinking that these are not even Men's sizes. They are so small and narrow even my small feet can't fit in them.
customer_reviews.author: Bev and Chris Wood

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes on my husband!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shows on my husband. They look nice with either jeans, shorts, or athletic wear. We like the shoes so much, that we’ve purchased them twice over the last 5 years. They look so nice! My husband said they’re really comfortable and fit true to size; however, the toe box area is tighter than other shoes. He has a narrow, flat foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Frenzel

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: I have never had problems with my feet before, but I developed plantar fasciitis after using these shoes for a while. I did a lot of walking before that in the summer, so maybe it was a coincidence. I bought a pair of New Balance shoes and had to quit walking for a while, but now the Pumas are in the land fill and I am back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: oilteq

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Well first off they'll do but I've been buying puma for years and these are fake. Is that not illegal. I noticed the puma Roma in black with the tan on the sole has a black puma stripe while the real ones have a white stripe against black and gold pro t on the side and also a green tongue tag on the outside not black even on my black classics. It's not a real puma trust me. These feel so hard and plastic like dollar general shoes.
customer_reviews.author: User XYZ

customer_reviews.title: the price point and the fact that they looked a lot like my old Pumas
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing Puma baseball shoes many years ago and have continued choosing Pumas whenever they were available ever since. I chose this shoe for two reasons: the price point and the fact that they looked a lot like my old Pumas. They have been fine up to now, but I was a little turned off by the fact that the sole is nothing more than a thin strip glued to the bottom....and not glued all that well. I would still consider Puma in the future, but will insist on a shoe where the sole is integrated into the bottom of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Over all good but
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight, wore them out love the fit. Looks nice. If your wondering if thier real, well to my eye and a a person know who sells sneakers these or real. You might get a fake pair but even conspiring these to mine I bought in a store they or the same.
customer_reviews.author: lilFetty

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not up to normal quality. Puma is usually my go to show for long lasting and comfortable shoes. I bought these for a clinical rotation and after 4 days of use the bottom of the sole came unglued, which will render these shoes useless quicker. Hard to say if I got a lemon pair or if the quality standard is no longer there.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Czajkowski

customer_reviews.title: Puma Power
customer_reviews.text: I am completely obsessed with Puma sneakers, I have 15 pair not counting my 12 pairs of Puma golf shoes. I wanted to get a pair for the gym so I didn't ruin the ones in my collection. These are SO cool. There is something about the big blue stripe and the wide flat laces that are just so classic. Lots of compliments on them at the gym. I put them through hell working out everyday and they just look and feel better and better each day. And this from a Puma fanatic!
customer_reviews.author: Spidey

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was so tight on my toes that I had to return them. I ordered 2 pair the first time I ordered the wrong size so never put them on. The second time I ordered the right size but couldn't walk in them cause they were too narrow and they smashed my toes.
customer_reviews.author: A Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these shoes - but they are narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and color options of these pumas. I've been looking for a red pair of sneakers for the longest time and didn't love anything I saw until I saw these. If you're a woman, these fit great you just need to figure out your size conversion. It's much narrower than I expected so I definitely don't recommend these for wider feet. It doesn't look and feel like they're men's shoes, I think they're unisex.
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: I have been an 8.5/42 since I was about 18. These were comically small. I suppose my foot may be getting bigger as I age, but these were like kid's shoes. If I replaced (which I won't online) I would try a 9 and a 9.5... beware
customer_reviews.author: Thomas DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Sleek, and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Puma sneakers for years and I bought these to replace my Puma Attaq's which are now worn out. The Puma Roma is comfy, lightweight, gives you an inch lift, and has a sleak design. Very happy with my purchase and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Gav Reid

customer_reviews.title: Style is nice; but not breathable shoes at all
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great! It feels a little small (I wear 10.5-11.5, ordered 11, and it felt slightly small) I'm worried that the front of the shoe is starting to wrinkle (when your foot bends near the toes) after only light usage. Biggest complaint: The shoes are not breathable, and I can't wear them for more than a few hours without wanting to take them off to let my feet breathe. take
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay and not for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these and got them for the classic look but they are not that comfortable. The leather is very thin and light combined with what I feel is a very thin and cheap sole with little to none arch support makes you feel you bought an knockoff shoe. Because of the thin soft leather and the extra narrow sole they tend to get wrinkles around the ball of your toes and curve of your arches. Definitely not a everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Murkum Mike

customer_reviews.title: My go to sneaker brand
customer_reviews.text: Leather Puma sneakers are always narrow,but....very soft,comfortable, leather,that stretches and conforms to the shape of your foot like a good pair of driving gloves fit your hands. Once the leather breaks in,these are super comfortable. I have a medium wide foot with a very high arch,and this is my brand for sneakers. Laces could be a little longer,so minus a star,but easy enough to get new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes okay but they are a little narrow. I don't have wide feet so it is not really that big of deal. I wish I would have gotten a size up but they feel fine. The bottoms are very slippery when they are wet. I fell when I stepped on my threshold on my front door when it was raining. Maybe they will become less slippery once I break them in from wear.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Small and tight
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of shoes I’ve ever purchased that were too small and too tight. If I have problems with shoe size it’s always been because they were too large. My normal size is an 8 and while I purchased these to wear without socks, the size 8 is too tight all over to wear for any long period of time with or without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Good value for casual sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes for casual wear and they look great. However they are NOT for standing on feet all day or running. Had to add gel inserts but since they are a little more narrow than most they got a little tight. I just had to change laces because these were too short after I loosened them. overall good sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: gibs

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual dress shoe, not running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Really good arc support, A little too stiff for running. Could take a little while to wear them in! I got too many pairs of shoes to let them wear in quick, huh 🤔! I’m going to Lace these up like the old school Adidas, Salt and pepper days. If you don’t know who they are, the same time as Queen Latifah, yo-yo, and Left eye!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: They turned pink!
customer_reviews.text: Wore them few times, looked good when they arrived (second order) ran small and had to exchange. The issue is the leather turned pink somehow. No clue how that even happens. Ran through washing machine and still pink so they trash now
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not leather
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it's so hard to find leather shoes anymore on here. Shoes fit, they don't last long since they're not leather. I had bought him a black pair for work before these that weren't leather either, and they've already been trashed. Maybe the description said it wasn't leather, if so, my mistake. Hubs needed white shoes in a hurry. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: iluv2garden

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Subpar
customer_reviews.text: Quality is subpar. Definitely not what they once were. The last pair I purchased back in the early 2000’s were strong and better quality. After 2 days the sneakers are already creasing in different areas. Feel very cheap on your feet. For the price..I would only recommend this to someone who is using these on occasion. A summer sneaker to match an outfit, 2-3 times a week. Wouldn’t recommend them other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Cm Collectorsvault

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but aren't made for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, but I wouldn't recommend these for daily use or for a long day of walking. The insoles aren't made to support anyone unless they're wearing them for long enough to have a photo shoot or for driving a mile up the road to get fast food drive thru. I put them on and stood up for me to instantly realize that I will not find comfort in these shoes. I regretted buying them as soon as I tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Myke

customer_reviews.title: good looking but runs small
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking shoe but the size and the width are smaller than one would expect. I buy a lot of Puma shoes. They normally run true to size. This particular style runs narrow and at least a half size short in the length. It is truly disappointing. Unfortunately I trusted them to be correct and disposed of the box and materials immediately. Now I cant return them. I would recommend you heck closely order a half size larger, and if you have more than a medium width forget them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very very narrow and are not very comfortable like I thought they would be. Though the size I ordered is the size that I always wear, they are extremely tight width wise yet sloppy and rub up and down when trying to walk in them. Overall, not really what I was hoping for. The price was good but other then that would t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: 5 but got a 9 in these and perfect fit. Comfortable and classy old school
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8.5 but got a 9 in these and perfect fit. Comfortable and classy old school. My go to show with jeans and the blue and orange go well with different color combos in clothing believe it or not. I like them also in this color because unlike some other Puma in this style, the end of the shoe is proportioned with the sole of the shoe, while other shoe colors seems to extend past the rear of the sole of the shoe. I hope you understand that lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bangah

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes for the look, comfort is okay. They are a stiff shoe so be warned to break them before you wear them for long periods of time. I did developed blisters on both my pinky toes. I still am having some discomfort with that after wearing the shoes for 4 days. I believe once they are broken in I will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cara M Gelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't get them unless u have narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lady and i wear a 10 and I wear a 9 in men. But I ended up buying a 10 in men and i should have bought a 10.5 the shoes are a bit snugg and still too nartow for me. My feet are wide. I guess Puma don't make wide shoes. So i thought if i go up a size maybe they wont be snugg or narrow. That didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Shaquitha Simpson

customer_reviews.title: It will take some time for your feed to get used to them
customer_reviews.text: They fit their size, most reviews say they don't, but they do, advice is: get a number larger than your shoe size because they are tight on the side of your toes. Using them for a long walk gets uncomfortable quick the first time you wear them but they get loose quick and they look great. People complain on the materials but they are less than 50 bucks shoes, IMO you get good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Garcia

customer_reviews.title: 100% Authentic Puma shoes from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: In 2015 I bought these Roma in the black/white colorway and it fitted so tight in a size 11. 4 years later I decided to buy another pair, this time I go Black/Black colorway because they lasted so long they are very durable and comfortable for every day wear, this time I go 1/2 size up from 11 and it fits perfectly on my slim feet. These are the best shoe from the Puma's collection. They are 100% AUTHENTIC once they are ship and sold by Amazon.com Services.....
customer_reviews.author: RICKY

customer_reviews.title: Not made of leather
customer_reviews.text: The listing says that they're made of leather, but they are most definitely not. They are made of "other materials" according to the box.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wood

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: First off the soles are great. No real break in needed. The weight is deceptive, seems flimsy at first but the construction has held up. More of a kick around walking shoe than anything. Skateboarding and yard work, not such a good idea. Size is a little small by maybe an 1/8" so no socks or a half size bigger if your toes go all the way to the end of your regular shoe. But all said I love the simple style and they aren't Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nohrnberg

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers were okay so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband. So far mostly satisfied with the shoes. He was saying he was expecting the toe to be different, but he was okay with these. Hoping these sneakers last longer than the last pair he bought in another store. His foot on the left side is artificial and doesn't give like his own foot does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So stylish they hurt
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, but narrow as heck. I wear size 9 about 90% of the time. 10% of the time I can rock size 8.5. These probably would have suited me best in a 9.5. Aside from the narrow width- I’ve got no complaints at week one. Hopefully they wear in and ease up.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: I am going to buy a shoe stretcher and see if this helps other than that the shoes are perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I Bought these shoes for my husband for Christmas since I always start early to be able to pay in cash and not get in debt but since my husband has a wide foot these shoes are too narrow from the front. I am going to buy a shoe stretcher and see if this helps other than that the shoes are perfect and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Castro

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: To me these ran true to size my foot size is an 11.5 C. I ordered a 12 and these fit perfectly. Feel slightly snug in width, but that is the was I like my shoe to fit. I ordered these shoes as my workout shoes in the gym and so far they have done what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Brendle

customer_reviews.title: SKINNY IN THE FRONT
customer_reviews.text: MOST OF THE SHOE FITS, BUT THE TOE BOX IS VERY VERY NARROW. I'VE LOOSENED THE LACES ALL THE WAY TO THE BOTTOM, BUT STILL, THE BONES IN THE FRONT FOOT ARE PAINFULLY TIGHT AND THE SHOE IS JUST TOO NARROW TO ACCOMMODATE, BUT THE NEXT SIZE UP WOULD BE LOOSE EVERYWHERE ELSE
customer_reviews.author: Burley Brent Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worst fit bad product stay away
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size mens 10.5 wouldnt fit my sons foot who is q size 9 this was ordered for my husband who wears size 10 I even went up half a size this item is pure junk. Poorly sized waste of money they dont know what they are doing. Would never buy or reccomend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow to medium size foot. These shoes were more narrow than any shoe I have ever purchased. Men’s size 11 and the heal was barely 2” wide. I returned for refund because they did not have the wide width (that I normally never need).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed this time. Last pair was great.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted barely 4 months, while sole & holes started developing within 3 months of moderate use. This was the 2nd pair I bought for someone because the 1st pair performers and lasted almost a year. Idk what happened. Bummer. Decided to go with Nike this time.
customer_reviews.author: litetalker

customer_reviews.title: Toes are narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband since he will only wear pumas and i love the price. However the shoe itself is a lot narrower than any of his other pumas have ever been. Especially in the toes. He is still wearing them for now but i suspect he wont put up with it for long.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Worse pair of shoes I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have bought a pair of shoes online and hated it. From the time I opened the box I said 'no no, I don't like it.' The shoes is ugly. One straight narrow shoes. I put it on and the size is not a problem, but less than 2 minutes and my little toes started burning. They probably made these for three toed people. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Puma Men's ROMA Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves are very nice and I love the style. However, the figment for me is a big problem. I am usually a 11-11.5 US Men's for the majority of my footwear (sneakers, boots, sandals). These however, at just an 11 were too big. I have a wider foot than longer, and these would fit someone well with my opposite foot type; long and skinny, not wide and somewhat shirt. I exchanged the 11s for 10.5 and they still are loose on me.
customer_reviews.author: FutureNow

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Pumas
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big fan of everything Puma and these shoes are no exception. I love the look and feel and continue to be a Puma supporter especially after getting these new kicks. The price of Puma shoes has always been an unbeatable bargain. **If my review was helpful to you, please click the “Helpful” button below, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Bulkiest (but comfy) pumas I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Roma’s in the past and I loved them. These fit the same, as in they run small, however they are much more bulky than I remember. I believes there may be extra padding surrounding the heal, which makes the whole back of the shoe look bigger. This makes them much more comfortable than I remember but also more bulky so I think less stylish - especially when wearing skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: White Collar Millennial

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have at least 20 pairs of Pumas and the fit of these are the absolute worst. I have a red and black pair of Romas and did not have an issue with them being too tight. Now i'm wondering are these authentic and if not Amazon you should be ashamed for allowing this to be on your site.
customer_reviews.author: busta bus

customer_reviews.title: Stupid
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure which big shoe company owns Puma, but I loved them when I was in highschool in the 80's, so I took a chance. This pair of shoes feels really cheap, a little small, flimsy. I'll use them as beach shoes I guess. They'll be the last Pumas I ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Shoe material is "pleather"
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took these out of the box, I knew there was gonna be a problem. I could tell just by looking at them they weren't gonna be comfortable. The material was "pleather". They were tight when I put them on and instantly started to "crease" when I walked around the house in them a few times thinking maybe my eyes were deceiving me. Nope. Fortunately they were returnable.
customer_reviews.author: IgglePhreak

customer_reviews.title: My super cute Puma Sport shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little bit narrow but they’re really cute and nice quality I’m stretching them out and then they’ll fit perfect I’m just putting stuff inside them to stretch them out a little bit very nice style perfect for the money
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Small and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: As a school teacher, I've looked for a nice looking comfortable all-black shoe. This is more comfortable than a typical dressy shoe, but more lightweight than I expected. If you're looking for a durable athletic shoe, this is not it. Although I liked the price, I do not plan to buy this shoe again.
customer_reviews.author: stengel99

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, not sure why pumas are so inexpensive but that’s one thing I love about them. So many styles and super comfortable, last a long time and feel nice on walks even with my flat feet and no arch supports
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Puma letters on inside came off within two weeks, ...
customer_reviews.text: Puma letters on inside came off within two weeks, and the corner of the sole is coming loose from the bottom of the shoe. I work in an office, It hasn't been a month, and I have not worn these every day. These seem cheaply made, and are not as high quality as my last Pumas.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Wears well,  but tight and pinches
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these Pumas because they're made with synthetics, not leather. The length (size 9) was just right for me, but they pinched on the outer side just behind the toes. I thought this would lessen after breaking them in, but the pinching remains to some degree. My feet get little red spots at the point of pinching. In spite of this, I purchased another pair recently, since the sneakers have worn so well -- much better than my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I don't quite clean my shoes very often (not a collector either) but I do not wear it when it's rainy or on mud, dirt, etc. It is still looking great after 1.5 years now. Soles are still in good shape without too much wears. Okay for daily wear. Very comfort. Stay away from rain, mud, or anything potentially harm the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JKim

customer_reviews.title: Bargain and so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on Prime Day and so got a great deal. Regardless they are a fantastic pair of sneakers for the full price. I have recieved numerous compliments about them and because I have the same feet size as my girlfriend she has also had many compliments. Have recommended others to buy and will probably buy some more!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special...
customer_reviews.text: The only positive thing is that I'm planning to wear these shoes for work. It's a lite shoe and kinda weak on quality. I just hope they last me after the summer season. Still looking for the mono black Schumaker/Ferrari F1 leather Pumas driving shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh Water Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy no receipt 🤔👀
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a great fit! Nice color but the box is packaged not so professional however product is good. The box was smashed and color green without receipt 🤔 wasn't sure about this however overall happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Retro Trendy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of sneakers that would look cook with jeans - a little old school since I'm a middle aged man. They look cool without me trying to be 17 years old. I will say this - they are VERY VERY WHITE coming out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Cara Mandart

customer_reviews.title: Classic style.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice “old school” design of a classic style. Width was a little narrower than expected but still a good fit. Plenty of room in the “toe box”. Could use a little more arch support. Overall, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Low quality material but fits great.
customer_reviews.text: You will notice that the material quality is lower than expected from Puma: I suppose that's because of the price. It feels good, and fits very well, but it's not a shoe that will last very long before it starts cracking or flaking on the outside. It's definitely the lowest quality puma I have ever purchased, and will probably resume going to the mall to actually touch and feel shoes before buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes but are VERY narrow. Once you open the box and compare the shoes to a normal size pair it’s about half the width. Unless you have really narrow feet these shoes will be too small and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Spate

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe but I have to return it. Way too narrow. I don't have super wide feet but these were way too tight for me. If you have narrow feet this will probably fit great. Also, they are synthetic leather which means they will not stretch like real leather.
customer_reviews.author: K. Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: The shoe does not run true to size my husband wears a 10.5 we ordered and had to exchange for a 11 and still had to use shoe stretchers including the foam and let the sit for a week or more in order for him to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as suede models
customer_reviews.text: The fit is true to other puma shoes I've had but the materials and build quality seem to be sub par as compared to similarly priced suede models. The upper is a very lightweight synthetic material that just feels like it won't last. I'll be returning these for a different model.
customer_reviews.author: mountaindew267

customer_reviews.title: It was a bit narrow, so it feels quite tight.  Probably at least a half size larger to accomodate.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size 10.5, and it feels quite tight and narrow. At least a size 11 or 11.5 would probably fit properly. Not sure though but it definitely fits more narrow than usual
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Muneno

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up.
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and these shoes naturally fit narrow. So after reading all the reviews I just ordered a size bigger and they fit great. They are stylish shoes and a good price. Just make sure you go a size bigger if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Lovin them whites!
customer_reviews.text: Puma's are my favorite shoe to wear because they are PERFECT for my feet! It's like they were designed around my own foot width and size. I have always had a wider foot and these have been one of the better shoes for support and overall comfort. I highly recommend Puma's for anyone that has just a tad wider foot than normal and wants a very comfortable shoe! Oh, and the prices are very hard to beat when found on sale, they are $35 and below for some of the more popular styles.
customer_reviews.author: shojus

customer_reviews.title: puma you have lost your way shame shame wast of money
customer_reviews.text: shoe wont fit me at 10.5 width size to tight i gave them to my nephew who is an 8.5 and still tight width seems puma has become more about the dollar then the actual fitting of there customers comfort .
customer_reviews.author: rperez

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing white Puma Romas for several years. I recently ordered a black pair and use those as my work shoes. They are very comfortable for all day wear. My feet are a little on the wide so they're snug at first, but not to the point where they are uncomfortable, and eventually they stretch out. My only complaint is that they take on a permanent odor after about 4-6 months. Maybe the issue is with my feet and not the shoes, maybe I wear the shoes tighter than they are meant to be worn. My workaround is I got some Odor eaters replacement inserts, makes them feel like brand new. Highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop and read reviews about this Kick! Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a ten in women tennis since these were men I got a 8.5 and these still was a no go. I gift my daughter with them and she’s thrilled...note: no room around the toes and tight no give basically, very uncomfortable just to stand in them, wish I would’ve known to get a whole size bigger. Don’t make the same mistake I did. Guess that’s what I get for wanted old school kicks.
customer_reviews.author: No complaints here

customer_reviews.title: I came back home to Puma!
customer_reviews.text: After years of wearing Nikes, I returned to wearing the sneakers I wore years ago. Not the greatest and most stylish sneaker ever made but I'm a lot less active than I used to be, so they're good enough for my current lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: I'd give these a higher rating, but they are just a little narrow. I am super consistent with my shoe size (10.5) and normal width. I was hoping these would stretch a bit as i broke them in, but so far it's clear that they will just be on the narrow side. It's not a total deal breaker, but after a long day it can be noticable and I'm ready to take them off. If you have narrow feet, go for it, if wider than that, just be aware you could face the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: OptionAndrew

customer_reviews.title: way smaller then sized
customer_reviews.text: way smaller then sized. i was expecting this and bought a 1/2 size larger then normal. wow i have a narrow foot but this is bad. bought some shoe stretchers to make this work. 2 days in the stretchers so far!
customer_reviews.author: eagledancer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Shoe- Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 14 regular and it is almost physically impossible for someone to have a size 14 foot that is this narrow. Terrible and unrealistically narrow shoe. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Be warned these shoes are vary narrow in width
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews Saying they’re narrow before I purchased. I thought “how bad can they be?” Yes I see now after Trying them on. They are vary narrow even buying a size larger than normal. So Here i had an inch of space between my toes and front of shoe yet my sides were bulging out so bad it was painful and I was waiting for them to tear on me. Needless to say I returned them. Have no idea why puma would make such a narrow shoe
customer_reviews.author: D Becker

customer_reviews.title: Holds up for walking in the city
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is great. Shoes look good even after a few walks and events. Overall comfortable. A little narrow, my feet are pretty wide so these shoes really hug but I’ve been able to break them in. I’m satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C&J

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband. When he first got them they were very tight on his feet especially at the toe box. He said the show is very narrow at the top. He has had them for about a month now and after breaking them in he says they feel much better and comfortable. I love how they look on his feet! Very cute and stylish! The price ain't bad either! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Marsheka Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Muffin top feet
customer_reviews.text: I have never had to buy "wide" shoes even in other Pumas. These were so narrow that I questioned whether they were for adults and if not for being a size 13, I would have sworn they were kids shoes. I can get them on, and the length is ok, but the shoe makes it looks like I've squeezed my foot into a muffin pan with my foot being the muffin top. Needless to say, these are not being worn.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: still good
customer_reviews.text: anyone want a free pair of ahoes? i just bought them too small. or at least its small on one foot because i have torn ligaments and my foot is always swollen but i forgot. lol
customer_reviews.author: vet dude

customer_reviews.title: Unable  to select the width
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, the color was what i was looking for. The width was the problem is was so narrow i couldn't put my feet into the shoe, the size was great just the width. I would order this again if i could get it in a size 12 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Smith

customer_reviews.title: these sneakers are narrow
customer_reviews.text: excellent looks as great as pictured very comfortable not meant to be worn for men with wide feet only narrow. thanks Amazon great buy you can't beat the price perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puma shoe at Kmart quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 pair assuming puma quality as always. Wrong. These are ALL plastic shoes. Terrible non quality. They are all going back at no fault to Amazon, just a terrible puma product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 12 because that is the size I wear. All of my shoes are a size 12. I could hardly get these on my feet. Probably a good shoe, but size is way off.
customer_reviews.author: Farm75

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sizing
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sizing- ordered a size 9 and My son could barely get his foot in.. Must be closer to size 7.5. He’s wearing them hoping they will break in . I don’t think this is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Still good overall.
customer_reviews.text: These are my third straight pair. Seems like they aren't as comfortable as the former two, but still good overall. Maybe just my own getting older makes them not seem as comfortable. We'll see if they are constructed as well as the former pairs which lasted me many years each.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bedwell

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to like these but I didn’t. They are a little too narrow and not comfortable at all. Very still and get creased everywhere after the 1st wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: These shoes run a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: 'Somewhat small' being one of the choice phrases is misleading. I would use the phrase 'a bit narrow'. Other then that, they are fine. I have another two pairs of Puma shoes (one being golf shoes) that are normal width. Interestedly, back in 1962, I wore a pair of low cut Puma football shoes in high school.
customer_reviews.author: R.A. CARLSON

customer_reviews.title: Puma Roma not fitting the same
customer_reviews.text: I've had worn Roma's for many years, I can say close to 10 years straight...Has the material or anything else changed? This is the 2nd pair I purchased thru Amazon and these ones I cannot wear at all. The Toe Box is extremely tight fitting, no comfort/cushion at all. The exterior shell material leaves hard creases which is not at all what they used to be. Will never order these online again.
customer_reviews.author: HSLA

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Roma Basic Sneaker
product_meta.description:
PUMA serves up a laid-back retro classic with this sleek sneaker.

The Roma is the stuff of PUMA Archive legend with its sport-turned-street style. The original, which debuted in 1968, was geared for sprints, hurdles, and sweatbands with its padded nylon-suede styling and knack for collecting medals. It's reissued here, in all its glory (less the tube socks) and is fully equipped with a padded tongue and arch support. Fresh details include its leather upper and modern color palette.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.

See more
feature_bullets: Retro-inspired sneaker featuring signature Formstrips at sides and exaggerated-lug outsole for traction
